website_summaries.verdict: The ideal introductory toy for youngsters who are learning to operate an RC car for the first time. It's cute, fun, and easy to for little ones to master, but not ideal for older kids.
pros: With features like easy-to-grip control and straightforward push button mechanism, it's designed with novice RC users in mind
Has removable figures, lights, and music
cons: Not built to withstand rough handling
Doesn't move too well on thick carpet

customer_reviews.title: OK if you only have 1 kid
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. PRO: The 2-button interface is really simple. Car is durable attractive and works well. price is OK. CON: If you want to have the kid drive the car through an obstacle course, it is very challenging to steer. This car is also INSANELY LOUD and plays obnoxious music and SFX. I am quite accustomed to noisy kids toys and have a pretty high tolerance, but this one is the worst. be warned. I have a 1 year old and a 3 year old, and I purchased 2 of these with hopes they could play/race/share with friends. You can not. There is only 1 radio channel availavle. see the 'questions' section and be warned.
customer_reviews.author: SmackiuS

customer_reviews.title: Very cute toy
customer_reviews.text: Ok. I needed to update the review. Initially when I received the toy, it wasn't working. I was disappointed. It was a gift, and the child opened the toy, only to found out it is not working. I contacted the seller. They were nice and very helpful, and very quickly they send me a new toy! It works. And is super cute. The child I gifted it to, loves it as well. This toy is really fun. (I would give 5 stars, but because the first order came defected and the child was disappointed, just like me, I had to take one star away. But they are nice company, that works with you to solve any issues!).
customer_reviews.author: Adalinka

customer_reviews.title: It works very well on wood floors but only slightly on my thick rug.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this toy to my grandson who turned two. I watched him play with it and he learned quickly. He pushed the buttons to make it play music as well. Only thing was, those buttons only worked a short time, like 30 minutes. Luckily, the remote functions still work so he is still happy. Update: This company read this review and reached out to me. They offered to replace this toy. That was very nice, but i actually like the fact that its quiet now! I recommend this company. They care!
customer_reviews.author: ohDenise

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: This toy worked for all of five minutes. After that you had to touch the antena of the car with the antena of the remote for it to work. We changed the batteries on both the car and the controller. No happiness. We contacted the seller and asked for a replacement and they kept asking for more details, which we gave them and then they wanted us to send a video of the problem. I found this very unhelpful, we gave them all the details, I work, I don't have time to record a video, upload it to my computer to send. They did not respond.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: VERY STURDY, HAVE BOUGHT THIS FOR OTHER KIDS.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy car. Little kids always want to carry them around by the antenna and this can take a beating. Cute music, easy for tots to operate—my 2.5 yr old grandson loved it and the older kids, 5 and 7 couldn't wait to get their hands on it either.
customer_reviews.author: M Simon

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 2 year old and he did not like it because he was scared of it. We’ve had it for 2 years and I think it is better for him now, though he is still skittish of things that move on their own. I think as he grows and can learn to operate it on his own it will appeal more to him. It is very durable and holds up. I think for parents with kids nervous of toys that move, they should wait till the child outgrows they fear and can control it on their own, otherwise it is a great toy for many ages.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J

customer_reviews.title: Ok toy car
customer_reviews.text: Eats through batteries fairly fast, but runs at a decent speed on hard surfaces and our kids love the music and noises it makes when pushing the button on the car. The car is a bit awkward to control as it doesn't have multi-directional turning. It can go straight forward, or backward turning in one direction. Sometimes getting the thing to turn the direction you want in a limited amount of space is hard or impossible. Also as an aside, the antennae are a bit too rigid (especially for kids) and our kids were quick to snap the plastic covering of the antennae at the base, exposing metal antennae coil. Still works though.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy For First Remote Control Experience
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely adorable remote control car. The car comes with a removable race car driver figure. It's a great 1st experience with remote controls for a 2-5 year old. It is very safe for little toddlers. It has no sharp edges, no parts that can break off, and the antennas are flexible with capped tips that cannot be removed. That was my major concern for my 2 year old grandson. It has different buttons that make different sounds when pressed, with flashing headlights too. It's colorful and is lightweight so it can't do damage to your wall's baseboards. I wasn't sure I'd be keeping before it arrived, but I love it and know my grandson will too!
customer_reviews.author: NanaJ

customer_reviews.title: Father and Son Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This is cute, easy to use toy. Requires two AA batteries that last us about a month. The control is simple, one button to move forward, one to turn in a circle. My husband and 18 month old son have a ton of fun with this. Additionally, the "driver" makes noise when the car bumps into objects, or when he is pushed, and there is a button on the top of the car that plays music and car sounds. I thought this toy would be too advanced for my toddler, but I was joyfully wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Small, easy to use, so much Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these remote cars for my grandson several years ago and he enjoyed it so much! The optional music is very catchy and the lights flashing. It was easy for him to use and the size was perfect. I have recently purchased one of these for my granddaughter, and even though she is only 5 months old, she is entertained by watching someone else put it through its paces---it has two directions, straight ahead and in a circle---very easy for Grandma to play with too! It does use five batteries which hopefully will have a long life but worth it for the fun it gives my little "grands"!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Company backs their product.
customer_reviews.text: We received this when I was at my granddaughters and it did not work. I contacted the seller and they got another out right away with no issues. Unfortunately I had left by then but received pictures of my granddaughter (age 19 months but very smart) using it. So comical! Seemed to be very easy to maneuver for her and she laughed as she attempted to chase the dog with it. Thank you Holy Stone for backing your product!
customer_reviews.author: SF Tigger

customer_reviews.title: Simple controls and intriguing toy for toddler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a two year old and she was very intrigued by it initially. But with any toddler, they are only interested in it for so long. I think this toy was simple enough to introduce her into remote control cars. It only goes straight forward and turns as it reverse. The car itself uses four AA batteries and you could definitely tell it slows down pretty quickly after some playtime. 4 star because the car will sometimes start and go by itself if you forget to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: A. L. N.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dec 3, 2017:The car broke within few months of use The antennas are very sensitive for toddler use Dec 18. 2017Update: After posting the earlier review the customer representative reached out to me right away to address the problem. One of the best customer representatives I have ever interacted with. Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: IAM

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: My 19 month old likes it and I like it too :) 5 AA batteries are needed to get this bad boy up and running and a tiny-tiny screw to remove from the the battery lid. Trying to find a screwdriver that size was a challenge so I used the tip of a letter opener. It has music that plays for a few seconds and then you can keep pushing the button if you want more music. It’s a fun little car.
customer_reviews.author: Tropicalbabe

customer_reviews.title: Fun Little First Car
customer_reviews.text: My 15-month-old son LOVES this car. He has played with it every day for a few weeks now. I am impressed that he is able to make it go himself. He especially likes to make it spin around in circles on our tile. It's sturdy and holds up to being thrown around a bit, as toddlers tend to do. It even moves pretty well on the carpet. Overall, it was a great purchase. My husband loves it so much that I probably should have gotten the 2 pack!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Forbus

customer_reviews.title: Great simple car
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little remote control car. My patients love it and it is easy to use for kids with fine motor deficits. The product is clearly made in China and the phrasing on the box will give you a good laugh, but it seems to be good quality. I have had multiple kids drive it off a wheelchair tray without it breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Claire C.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 2 year old son of his birthday. It was fun for about a week and then the remote broke. The company sent us another and it worked great for a while. The car worked a few times and then quit. The only way it will go is if the antennas are in direct contact with each other. It’s pretty disappointing that is broke twice with minimal use. I wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: gamerg57

customer_reviews.title: Best toddler remote control car!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 15mo old (at the time) and he LOVES it. Don't need coordination because either button makes it go somewhere. Places some fun sounds too. Sadly we lost the back to the car so now the batteries don't stay in. He's almost 2 and I'm thinking about getting another for his birthday coming up. Def worth it if your kid loves cars.
customer_reviews.author: Emily m

customer_reviews.title: Toddler favorite
customer_reviews.text: This little car was my grandsons favorite birthday gift! He is only 2 and can handle just the 2 options. He doesn’t really get that one is back and one forward but he knows just pushing one then the other keeps his car moving. He has dropped it already down a flight of tiled stairs and it didn’t affect it all. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible toddler RC car
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even know they made RC cars for babies/toddlers until my wife mentioned this thing. For the price (~$13), it's not a bad toy. Much cheaper than most options for kids of this age range. Lights up, makes sounds, has a song or two and it moves. Sure keeps my daughter distracted when she remembers she has this toy. If you need to get a RC car for your kid, get this. Plenty cheap enough that it won't hurt your wallet and it'll take a beating when your kid launches this thing across the kitchen for a laugh.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: The best gift! I bought this as a gift for ...
customer_reviews.text: The best gift! I bought this as a gift for a 17 month old.. What a hit! Easy to operate and durable! Great price! Would definitely recommend! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great race car but driving is difficult to learn for younger kids.
customer_reviews.text: My 17 month old loves his race car. Only thing I don't like is everytime you want to change directions or you have to go in reverse to do that. No left or right. One wheel got a but stuck in reverse as well so it goes slow now but forward still works good. My son thrives everything and this is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina chesky

customer_reviews.title: Fun car with a happy little tune
customer_reviews.text: Fun little car. Plays a happy little tune that my grandson loves. The little man is fun to take out and put back in. Only complaint is if you put the remote in a toy box, the buttons can be easily pushed and drain the batteries. The car has a on-off switch so it’s not an issue for the car, just the remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's second birthday and am really impressed. Of course he loves chasing it and dancing to the music it plays, but I am pleasantly surprised by how quickly it moves on our wood floors and that it also works on our carpeted areas. It even can make the little jump that transitions from one type of floor to the other! All this for such a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Dukie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Works well on carpet. A little tricky to maneuver because it only turns in reverse and only in one direction. Fun music and noises, but loud and no volume control. Only makes noises when buttons are pressed, so not too bad. Can't beat the price. An excellent value that made it possible for me to fulfill my son's Christmas wish. Delivered promptly and in perfect condition. Edit: added a star. My son is pretty rough with his toys. This has held up so well over the past year. A really terrific introduction to RC cars for very young children. It didn't take my son long to figure out how to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: NickStar

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE- the seller saw my 1 star post and contacted me personally to help trouble shoot the problem. When that didn’t work they sent me a new car no questions asked. My boy is so happy to be racing again and I really appreciate first class customer service!! I bought this as a little present for Easter to decrease the amount of sugar intake. This worked great for the first two days and then stopped working!!! My son and I are both so bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Schuerger

customer_reviews.title: Great for at least 18 months and older
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an eighteen month old. He totally loves it. My only negative is only on the remote, you go through a lot of batteries. So I try to remember to take them out after each use. So just make sure you keep the screw driver handy for putting the batteries in and out only on the remote part.
customer_reviews.author: Kids with Feathers

customer_reviews.title: Tech Remote Car
customer_reviews.text: My 2 years old son loves this tech car. He likes to play with its remote. It is so simple he loves its technology and enjoy all the time. I just got this car last week. I will recommended all for it. It is best to educate your kids with remote car. I can run in hard surface and carpet. it look like safe and durable. It is so cute looking.
customer_reviews.author: manij

customer_reviews.title: Cute fun toddler rc car
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute rc car for a toddler..my son is 15 months and so far it's a hit.. no sharp edges.. fun colors.. easy for him to try and use.. great for us to work for him aswell.. requires 5 AA batteries 3 for the car 2 for the controller.. get rechargeables
customer_reviews.author: ladydragon

customer_reviews.title: Totally stopped working after 1 month - Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's birthday in August and it is completely done after 1 month. Remote lights up like it should, Car lights up and makes sounds like it should. However communication from the remote to the car apparently gave up because nothing happens when buttons are pressed. Updating this review because of the excellent customer service. They sent me a new car free of charge.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Kokta

customer_reviews.title: seller was able to help get the car replaced quickly and easily! New car works wonderfully and my kids love ...
customer_reviews.text: Had issues with the car after we first purchased, seller was able to help get the car replaced quickly and easily! New car works wonderfully and my kids love it! Excellent customer service! Thank you DeeRC/Holy Stone for a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren J

customer_reviews.title: Great....while it works
customer_reviews.text: My son had use of this for less than three months before it stopped working. We changed the batteries, but the remote control still does not work. My son loved it, but is now disappointed. I have been speaking to Amazon for over an hour, but I am not getting any help. If you want a toy that will last for more than a couple of months, don't buy this. It is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jo White

customer_reviews.title: Greater starter r/c car for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter remote control car for toddlers. It’s very durable, and while my toddler had a bit of a learning curve in figuring out how it worked (mainly because she’s 2) she got the controls down eventually. And she even had fun playing with it before she fully learned the controls. It’s also taken a lot of abuse from my one year old and hasn’t shown any signs of breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Vijay and Alison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for one year old
customer_reviews.text: My 11 month old loves this remote control car! He can push the remote buttons to make it go and loves the sounds on the actual car too. Most important, both car and remote are sturdy and have held up to being dropped, thrown, chewed on, etc. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, fun for preschoolers and adults
customer_reviews.text: My four year old son loves this toy. We bring it out on rainy days when it's difficult to go outside, and it really livens up our living room. He can easily manipulate the controls and it moves quickly when the batteries are new. We had some friends (college age and older) last night and even they had fun driving it around and testing its maneuverability by creating little ramps for it and driving it up and over. It seems like a durable toy, as we've had it for several months and it still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Larkspur

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves this....he did get another one from a friend and you're unable to use both at the same time (him and his sister wanted to race them). One remote can be used on either car so if a set of twins wanted this item to race eachother unfortunately it won't work. One remote will end up dominating both cars. Perfect gift for a young child....bought one for a friends son and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Cara Doran

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: This broke within the first 15 minutes of use. My 3 year old son dropped the car from a height of 18 inches and the remote no longer communicates with the car. The car still makes honking and ignition noises when pushing its buttons. It’s cute but my son and his sister are is disappointed that it doesn’t drive anymore. I am disappointed too. Toys for 3 year olds should be more durable than this!
customer_reviews.author: laura horky

customer_reviews.title: Great for little hands
customer_reviews.text: Our two year old loved this vehicle the batteries lasted forever in this little car, he used it inside mostly on the carpet and linoleum and a little outside on the sidewalk not an off road vehicle as you can tell in the pictures. I only wish it had a quieter setting for the music its a nice song but it gets a little annoying after an all day session with it on. The buttons were easy enough for him to handle and the little guy pups out and he can play with him.
customer_reviews.author: NG Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: even after the chewing and throwing and the massive amount of abuse he puts this wonderful toy through
customer_reviews.text: Our 18 month old loves this. Though he doesn’t know how to play with this quite right yet, even after the chewing and throwing and the massive amount of abuse he puts this wonderful toy through, it still works great! Because the price is so reasonable I totally expected to buy and replace a broken one. But it’s still holding strong ! Great product. I even like playing with it myself sometimes Lol
customer_reviews.author: Defoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy for 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son on his third birthday. Haven't had it for long so I don't know how it will wear. What I can say is that my 4, 3, and 1 year old all love this toy. It drives quietly and the music/noises aren't too annoying, though I wish it was quieter. It drives well on carpet as well. The two back wheels have grippy rubber on them. This toy is probably most age appropriate for ages 2 and 3. Very easy to work and the fact that it can back up and turn (it does not back up straight) is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: My toddler received this for Christmas. He absolutely loved it. But the gears were stripped after a couple weeks. We thought it may be that he was too hard on it. Decided to purchase another since he loved it so much, but as soon as we got the new one, it was slower to begin with and doesn’t work as well as a new one should.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality Toy
customer_reviews.text: Since the opening of the box there were problems. The RC did not work cause of a false contact and the same day it stop working, no communication between the remote and the car. Very disappointed. Will do a claim cause It can't be, specially being an Amazon Choice.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco L.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME AND FAST!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little car is so much fun....I was iffy on how my 2 year old would do with it.... It's very durable and the thing has the AUDACITY TO BE FAST LOL! I actually like to play with it myself.... So parental APPROVED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ronni

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for supervised play with children!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with this RC car. I bought it to entertain my 10mo grandson. He loves it! Meaning he has grabbed it, and bounced it off the floor several times and it still keeps singing! I know this isn’t the intent of this product but I took a chance. No sharp edges. Very ruggedly built. Great product. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: G Sasaki

customer_reviews.title: Great first RC car!  Durable and the batteries last!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. My 20 month old LOVES it. Super durable, the remote control is easy enough for a toddler and has become one of his favorite toys. Also, haven’t had to change the batteries yet!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic RC car for my 18month old
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic RC car for my 18month old. HE LOVES IT! We have had for over a month and have not had to change batteries yet and I always forget to turn it off. This is the only toy that keeps my son's attention. Not only does he love to drive it, but he likes to bring me the remote and make me drive the car after him to play a game of chase. Great exercise on rainy days when we are stuck inside!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonmom

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Wow my 6 year old really has fun with this car set, I have bought 2 more as gifts for other kids! they love the heads popping off when they hit the side of the car, the kids love it! keeps them busy for a hours!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Brinker

customer_reviews.title: For the price it is great quality, works well
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 8 months old son. For the price it is great quality, works well, and has great sounds that really entertain my infant son. He bangs it around, and puts it in his mouth; nevertheless, it hold up and keeps on working. This is a great first rc car for a toddler. And is simple, easy to operate, and tons a fun for 3 and below. I've purchased 3 items from Holy Stone, and they have not let me done yet!
customer_reviews.author: Na'eem Abu Hafsa

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it. The remote was easy for him to figure out (he's 2 1/2). It's attractive and he loves the music. He's only had it about a month so I can't adequately respond to the battery life or durability of the product. But so far he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue H.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Broke within minutes. It’s rated for 18 months, but it’s not durable enough for a toddler. My two year old nephew literally used it for minutes before the internal workings were damaged beyond repair.
customer_reviews.author: aseids

customer_reviews.title: Perfect remote-control car for a beginner!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my grandson for his 2nd Birthday. He loves it! It was simple for him to use. He was able to do it himself after being shown a couple of times. Perfect for a beginner remote control!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Darden

customer_reviews.title: I will say that my son is good with "durability testing" toys as I'm sure most toddlers ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves it, just be aware that it gets a little creepy when the batteries start to wear out. I will say that my son is good with "durability testing" toys as I'm sure most toddlers are, he likes to "victory spike" his toys especially when he first gets them new. After numerous abrupt and violent impacts with our hardwood floors it still works just fine. We have numerous other toys that failed his resiliency testing.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to understand how to work with lots of cute ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to understand how to work with lots of cute sounds and lights. One thing to note is that the toy is made in Japan and the packaging has some odd English. I was going to give this as a gift for one of my son’s friend’s birthdays but feel embarrassed given the broken English. I am worried it may make the item seem cheap. Instead we decided to open it and play with it ourselves. My three year old likes it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this little car to anyone who wants to allow ...
customer_reviews.text: A very durable product. Lost a wheel, glued back on and this little car just kept going and going and going. The only reason it stopped was the batteries died. Would recommend this little car to anyone who wants to allow a child to run it inside and bang it up against walls. It just bounces off and keeps on going. The noise can get a little irritable but got used to after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Zzyzx

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's second birthday and she loves it as does her 6 year old brother! It has been around for 4 months now and is still going strong and being played with! Great product, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda T.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and toy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, put batteries in and the remote didn’t even work!l Update: they sent me a new one, which was great, and worked as described... their customer service is one of a kind, and they shipped very quick! Ty again
customer_reviews.author: Audreanna

customer_reviews.title: Best toy
customer_reviews.text: Got this when my kid was 14 months old. I drove it in circles around her and raced off qhen she would try to grab it. Great Fun. Shes nearly 2 now and understands the controls and can do it herself. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Cantstopmenow

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, fun purchase with some limitations
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun toy with a somewhat catchy but mildly annoying tune. Our son likes it. While it is easy to use, it really doesn't turn at all and works quite poorly on carpet, which I guess can be expected. I wish it had one additional button for turns or turned when you turn the wheel, but at this cheap price, it doesn't matter so much.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Requires Batteries and Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy for a 1 year old. Bought this for my son as one of his Birthday presents and he loved it. It is easy enough to use the remote control for lil one's hands and I really liked the quality of it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer 805

customer_reviews.title: Cheap trash. Broke in five minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Broke within five minutes of putting the batteries in and playing with it. I didn't even get to let my grandson play with it before it broke. Cheap trash. Not even worth the price of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: K. Manzone

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery life
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for less than 48hrs and it has either stopped working or killed the batteries that fast which I find hard to believe because my boys weren’t even playing with it for more than 3-4 hrs total. I replaced the batteries in both cars, 1 works and the other the tires try to spin but the car goes nowhere.
customer_reviews.author: dena howse

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy, Great company
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this toy. The first one I purchased broke in a few days. The company reached out to me after I left my first review and replaced it free. The have been so helpful and I would definitely purchase this as a gift again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast little car and fun to listen to.
customer_reviews.text: This little car can go!! The three different sounds it makes are all pleasant and the music button plays(sounds like a cha-cha) for three laps around our patio:) And I only buy toys that I can enjoy, too, for obvious reasons. My grandson (2yrs old), loves it. It is much more versatile than the Minnie Mouse car, which I bought for my 4yr old grandaughter, and the driver is indestructible.
customer_reviews.author: Joan A Kaliher

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the remote control is defective. The button sensors are activated by any type of movement of the remote control, making the car move just by holding the remote. We enjoyed it for a few days before it became too finicky and frustrating. On the plus side, we got a few laughs from the poorly translated phrases on the packaging. "The real beauty and cheerful music, interesting The character modeling, stimulate baby's infinite imagination." Lol XD
customer_reviews.author: 𝖠𝗆𝖺𝗓𝗈𝗇 𝖢𝗎𝗌𝗍𝗈𝗆𝖾𝗋

customer_reviews.title: Toy wasn't awesome but customer service was awesome
customer_reviews.text: its ok for what it is, but I was disappointed that it could not even move on carpet since we don't have much hard floor area in our house where my son could play. Also batteries don't last long. ----- I am revising this review to reflect the dedication of the customer service of Holy Stone. They went out of their way to make us happy. I got a call from China from their customer service. They promised to send a different toy (a magnetic drawing board). I have never experienced something like that. they take customer satisfaction seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Van Essendelft

customer_reviews.title: The price is right!
customer_reviews.text: I have three grandsons ages 3 to 4 yrs, so I bought three of these. They all loved them and played with them for hours. They are durable and the batteries never seemed to weaken.
customer_reviews.author: Horseman

customer_reviews.title: but am very disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE #1: Holy Stone contacted me and offered to replace the car. I am adding a star to my review for their great customer service. ORIGINAL REVIEW: After less than a week of supervised use (my child only has access to this toy when a parent is around), the car no longer turns and it only goes forward sometimes. All the noise functions still work but the remote-control aspect is really non-functional. I have this to be a popular toy with the kids, but am very disappointed in the quality. I would not recommend, nor would I purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: aqhshopping

customer_reviews.title: GREAT toy for young toddlers!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great, it’s the perfect toy for young toddlers - easy to operate, has numerous buttons on the car that they can press and it’ll make noise, very sturdy. My 2 year old absolutely loves it, I recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t get the remote to work
customer_reviews.text: Car didn’t work, totally bummed. Didn’t expect much from it but wanted to see my son play with it a bit. Remote control didn’t work so we can’t operate the car. Tried different batteries and swapped them around and still didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Shesoutside

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed as this was a gift for my nephew
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed as this was a gift for my nephew. Took it out of the box and was great, after 2 days it broken. He wasnt hard on it, it just wont work.
customer_reviews.author: elena

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED! AWESOME!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This car is AWESOME!!!! My twin boys LOVE the race car! And it plays a salsa type music which I love and it is super cute to watch them dance to it! They are 2 years old and super rough on toys. So probably after 100 drops and maybe getting crunched under the recliner a piece broke off and we deemed it unsafe...however still working. So we threw it away and bought a new one!!!! LOVE LOVE LOVE IT! And got one for a little friend of ours also as a birthday gift!!!! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: Ihearttravel

customer_reviews.title: Cute, my son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this car!!! He's 2.5. Unfortunately it broke after a few weeks. The reverse button no longer clicks, I even took the car remote apart and it's not fixable unless you know how to sauter chip boards. My son doesn't typically break toys, so I'm wondering if it's not as durable as it should be. Update: died completely by July (3 months) I contacted company support and got an immediate reply and offer for a replacement toy. contact usa@holystone.com
customer_reviews.author: RinaT

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied, one of the bottoms on remote control is ...
customer_reviews.text: Not satisfied, one of the bottoms on remote control is already not working :(, back wheels are not rolling :(
customer_reviews.author: Rasul

customer_reviews.title: Cool Idea, Antennas are not Secure
customer_reviews.text: We really wanted to like this car. I got one for my nephew and then to our surprise our daughter got one for Christmas too. She is 1.5 years old and plays with is on occasion. The buttons on the car and the little driver provide her with more entertainment than the controller does. After about 2 weeks of play the blue tip of the antenna came off and I tossed it in the trash to keep her from swallowing it. I heard from my sister the other day that the one we purchased for my nephew had the entire antenna come out of the controller. These could have been built a bit better .
customer_reviews.author: ErinsBookShelf

customer_reviews.title: Great grandson LOVES this
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my great grandson. He loves it! He chased it all over the place till he finally discovered how to use the remote. Then he chased it where ever he sent it! He ran off tons of energy and we all know 2 year olds have more energy than a foot ball team! He finally got tired and Kaye's down on the floor and patted the toy as he fell asleep! This a a perfect toy for toddlers!
customer_reviews.author: Sandorae

customer_reviews.title: Good remote control car for young children
customer_reviews.text: My 13 month old was playing with her older brother's remote control trucks so we thought we would try this car out. The controls were simple enough for her to figure out quickly and it makes fun sounds and music. After a few weeks the forward motion stopped working, most likely because she dropped the controller several times on our hardwood floors. After contacting customer service and explaining the issue, they were very helpful and sent a replacement in a matter of days.
customer_reviews.author: MClark

customer_reviews.title: Defective out the box
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work *Update* Receive call from customer service. They will be shipping me a new one. I will update my review once I receive the new item. I do appreciate the enthusiastic customer service. ** update 2 *** Got the new one it works great. Even runs on carpet. The sounds it makes are the cutest. My son enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: NC Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Remote Car For A Toddler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 18 month old grandson. He absolutely loved it!! It was easy for his tiny hands to operate, has bright colors, and he was in total awe that the little driver came out so he could play with it. Thank you so much for a toy that actually does what you claim and is a great first remote control toy for a small child.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves to play with this, kids & adults alike!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 20 month old granddaughter for Christmas 2016. I had gotten different ones for the 3 y/o and 5 y/o. It is now 7 months later. Only this one has survived and works great still. All three of them play with it as well as the adults. This is a great toy.
customer_reviews.author: K&C's Mom

customer_reviews.title: It really is an awesome little car
customer_reviews.text: Wow, has this little car taken a beating from the tons of kids who play with it. It is worth every penny, what a steal. My toddler son loves to smack on it and play with it. It really is an awesome little car. Goes on carpet but very slowly. Goes fast on smooth surfaces. Cute noises and phrases.
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: My two year old is scared of the movement, so she just plays with it without the remote. She does enjoy pressing the buttons and taking the driver in and out. My husband plays with it more then she does though lol. It is made in china I think so the noises are a little strange and one thing I wish is an option to turn down the volume because it is very load.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Toy, But..
customer_reviews.text: This toy worked very well and is very cute for a young child! I recommend the purchase of this toy. I wasn't crazy though that the sender did not put the toy in a typical brown box for mailing, but instead pasted a mailing label right onto the toy box itself and sent it through the mail like that! Fortunately the box was not damaged when it arrived, however, I tried to remove the mailing label, but could not do it completely, thus the box looked marred. Not cool for presenting as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: jburk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome RC car for the younger kids!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for 3 to 6-year-olds in my opinion. Works great, very easy to maneuver for these small kids. I bought two of my grandsons one of these and they play with them all the time and haven't been aggravated once with it. It's a winner! I am happy with the quality of this toy and the price is great for all it does!
customer_reviews.author: Debi S.

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 for grandsons, one never worked, one broke after a week
customer_reviews.text: Looked very forward to these. I have two grandsons both are two years old. One was a birthday gift that never worked and one worked for about three days and has not worked again. I did put in brand new batteries in each. I wrote to the company, they responded asking for additional information which I did provide and I've not heard from them in over a week. I was very disappointed for the boys.
customer_reviews.author: Blu7811

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Car
customer_reviews.text: We got this car for my two year old and it's a good starter RC car. The controls only allow it to go forward or reverse turning, there's no forward turning, but for a two year old it doesn't matter. The car plays fun music when you push buttons and the removable driver is fun. My only complaint is that antennas aren't very strong. My son can sit on his bed and play with his car, but once it gets to the other side of the room it quits responding. For a two year old it's great and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: not only does my son love it but the customer service is fantastic! the one i had stopped working and they sent me a new one free of charge. Within the warranty limit of course.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Z.

customer_reviews.title: ehhh. it's ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: cool toy. My 20 month old likes it and can actually drive it pretty well. Two things I can say about it...sounds are repetitive and pretty annoying sometimes and had to replace the battery after a few days because the car was left on...so make sure you switch it off.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Bentz

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this toy for a two year old boy's birthday.
customer_reviews.text: I specified this in my search, and was disappointed when he cold not get it to go straight, and then left it for his old matchbox cars. His 4 year old brother had no problem, and continues to play with it. The problem is not with the product, but with the advertising. ps: I'd return it, but I can't get it out of the 4 year old's hands!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie  A. Bark

customer_reviews.title: This did not work out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This never worked. I wanted to talk to someone for a replacement but there is no customer service available. I would like to try another one. Maybe I just got a bad one. It seems my only option is to return this broken product, reorder another one and hope for the best. Update: I changed my review because I did return the bad car and ordered another one. The new car worked. We will see for how long.
customer_reviews.author: Sheba Rotan

customer_reviews.title: Fast durable car!
customer_reviews.text: The car works great for my 13 months boy. The car is durable and fast. My son has drop his car many time and it does not have a scratch. It works well on tile, but its a bit slower on the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Santos Leon

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Waiting long from amazon opened box it worked for less than a minute what a waste of time and waste of shipping and return expenses
customer_reviews.author: arvind kumar panjwani

customer_reviews.title: and seems to really enjoy it. The two buttons that make noise work ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this RC car for our toddler. He's played with it for a few hours now, and seems to really enjoy it. The two buttons that make noise work well. It would be better if some lights flashed anytime the car moves. One issue is that the car doesn't really drive straight. It always drifts a bit off to the left. he doesn't seem to mind though. UPDATE: This company sent us a replacement car, and the new one is much better than the original one. Revising up to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T.

customer_reviews.title: Was a big hit at Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I was actually surprised at the Quality of this product for the price. Reading some of the reviews I was a little apprehensive as to the quality. For the price it was great. Bought for 18 month old grandson and the three and four year old grandchildren also liked it. Can't speak as to how long it will last but for the price I feel confident we got our money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: This toy won’t last long
customer_reviews.text: We saw this toy in friend’s house and my son really like it. So I ordered one immediately. The remote control doesn’t work when I put the battery in so I request a replacement. The second one I got only lasts less than 20 days. One of the button on RC isn’t working now and car sometimes stuck there for no reason. Really disappointed on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sha

customer_reviews.title: Fun but short battery life
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Quiet, fast, fun. Could be the perfect toy if the battery drain wasn’t so high. Daily use gave us about two weeks. We bought rechargeable batteries finally and that helped.
customer_reviews.author: christine skiles

customer_reviews.title: So far this is a durable fun little car
customer_reviews.text: So far this is a durable fun little car! Perfect for my two year old he is figuring out the controls and loves chasing it around. Goes well on low pile carpet, hardwood and tile floor but I could see it having difficulties with a more plush carpet. Has dropped the controller several times and it has not broken yet. Unusual music but it makes my toddler dance every time it plays so I can't complain
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Martin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: We love this car. It is easy for my 2 year old handle and it is durable, it has fallen several times down the stairs but it still works!
customer_reviews.author: Athanasia

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable first remote control car. My soon to be 2 year old was able to work this easily and really enjoyed it. This is a toy he has played with multiple times since Christmas. It seems to be durable, so far, considering it has been slammed into walls and furniture at full speed.
customer_reviews.author: Drantik

customer_reviews.title: Great first RC car
customer_reviews.text: My 1.5 year old loves this car. Great first RC car. We use it outside on the driveway and in the house. Olays a couple cute sounds and songs. Not annoying or loud by anymeans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little toy
customer_reviews.text: Been dropped, kicked, tossed. We've enjoyed it. Just keep a hold on the small screws, the battery lids won't stay closed if you lose those.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Mackenroe

product_meta.title: Holy Stone RC Cartoon Race Car with Music & Lights Electric Radio Control Toy for Baby Toddlers Kids & Children
feature_bullets: Fun to Play: Sleek wheels and a cute design make for a lightning fast and fun toy. Watch your child race along with it to see who is faster. For toddlers and children 18 months and up.
Features: Honking Sounds, Music and Flashing Headlights. Light and sound effects can be initiated by pressing the button on the remote-control car.
Spacemen Figure: The race car comes with a driver figurines that your kid can put in the driver's seat or play with on its own.

Easy to Control: 2 Channel remote control for forward and reverse left. Designed as a child's first remote control toy, this cartoon car comes with a steering wheel shaped RC controller with only 2 buttons for easy simplistic control.
Safety Design: Non-toxic ABS plastic construction with soft edges as well as soft remote antenna for safety and injury prevention. CPC Safety Test Approved

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,473 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
